author: Bryan Tong <bryan@nullivex.com>
name: kado
description: High Quality JavasScript Libraries based on ES6+
keywords: Kado High Quality JavaScript Libraries
Application Library for quickly building full service applications
Assert Library for making Assertions and throwing AssertionErrors
Asset Library for managing static file delivery
Child Process Library for quickly running and managing child processes
Cluster Library for conveniently setting up and operating process clusters
Command Library for easily building CLI programs
Command Line Server Library for running CLI against a virtual server
Connect Library for connecting third party systems into Kado
Connect Engine for building engines used with Connect for Kado
Cron Library run handlers like UNIX cron at 1 second resolution
Database Engine Library for connecting Databases
Email Engine Library for handling Email sending
Event Library with Levels and Handlers
FileSystem Library providing a clean consistent promise driven API
Format Library for Bytes, Numbers, Dates, etc
GetOpt Library for Parsing CLI Options
History Library, User Navigation History
HyperText Library for Managing HTTP Servers
Lanugage Pack Library for managing and displaying language packs
Library Searching Library for finding libraries in various paths
Log Engine Library for loading and using differnt log outputs
Mapper Library for Map class functions on Objects
Message Library for handling messages including outgoing email
Module Library super class for making new Kado modules
Navigation Library for registering application navigation points
Permission Library for checking permissions against a set and manage sets
Profiler Library for tracking and display application performance
Router Library for managing and matching routes, such as URIs
Search Library for managing handlers and executing searches on them
TestRunner Library for loading and running tests in a BDD interface
Utility Library for Kado Internals
Validate Library for validating inputs
View Library for managing and mapping views to view files
